Uses of Class
com.xuggle.ferry.RefCounted

Packages that use RefCounted
com.xuggle.ferry A collection of classes that ferry objects from Java to native code and back, and manage native memory. 
com.xuggle.xuggler An advanced API for reading, decoding, re-sampling, encoding and writing of most media files. 
 

Uses of RefCounted in com.xuggle.ferry
 

Subclasses of RefCounted in com.xuggle.ferry
 class IBuffer
          Allows Java code to get data from a native buffers, and optionally modify native memory directly.
 class Mutex
          Internal Only.
 class RefCountedTester
          Internal Only.
 

Methods in com.xuggle.ferry that return RefCounted
 RefCounted RefCounted.copyReference()
          Create a new RefCounted object that is actually referring to the exact same underlying native object.

Uses of RefCounted in com.xuggle.xuggler
 

Subclasses of RefCounted in com.xuggle.xuggler
 class Global
          A collection of static functions that refer to the entire package (like version getters).
 class IAudioResampler
          Used to resample IAudioSamples to different sample rates or number of channels.
 class IAudioSamples
          A set of raw (decoded) samples, plus a timestamp for when to play those samples relative to other items in a given IContainer.
 class ICodec
          A "key" to an IStreamCoder that tells it how to encode or decode data.
 class IContainer
          A file (or network data source) that contains one or more IStream objects of audio and video data.
 class IContainerFormat
          Specifies format information than can be used to configure an IContainer for input or output.
 class IContainerParameters
          Parameters that can be set on a IContainer before opening.
 class IError
          Maps from int return codes to defined Error values.
 class IIndexEntry
          An index entry for a IStream.
 class IMediaData
          The parent class of all media objects than can be gotten from an IStream.
 class IMediaDataWrapper
          This class wraps an IMediaData object, but then allows you to set new TimeStamps and TimeBases.
 class IMetaData
          Get MetaData about a IContainer or IStream.
 class IPacket
          Represents an encoded piece of data that can be placed in an IContainer for a given IStream of data.
 class IPixelFormat
          Information about how video data is formatted in an IVideoPicture object.
 class IProperty
          Represents settable properties that effect how Xuggler objects operate.
 class IRational
          This class wraps represents a Rational number for the Xuggler.
 class IStream
          Represents a stream of similar data (eg video) in a IContainer.
 class IStreamCoder
          The work horse of the Xuggler: Takes IPacket data from an IContainer (representing an IStream) and an ICodec and allows you to decode or encode that data.
 class ITimeValue
          Time (duration) values with units.
 class IVideoPicture
          Represents one raw (undecoded) picture in a video stream, plus a timestamp for when to display that video picture relative to other items in a IContainer.
 class IVideoResampler
          Converts IVideoPicture objects of a given width, height and format to a new width, height or format.
